bonzai.api

Interface Entity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Duck, Farmhand, Item, OwnedEntity

    public interface Entity
    An entity is a game object which can be interacted with in the world. Entities have a position (and a corrosponding tile) and know which farmhand is currently interacting with them. Only one entity may exist on a tile at any given time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Farmhand getHolder()
      Gets the current farmhand holding the game object.
      Position getPosition()
      Gets the location of the game object and returns it.
      Tile getTile()
      Gets the tile the game object is currently occupying.
      int getX()
      Gets the X location of the game object and returns it.
      int getY()
      Gets the Y location of the game object and returns it.
      boolean isVisible() 

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        int getX()
        Gets the X location of the game object and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        int the X location of the entity if visible, otherwise -1.

      • getY

        int getY()
        Gets the Y location of the game object and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        int the Y location of the entity if visible, otherwise -1.

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Gets the location of the game object and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        Position the location of the entity if visible, otherwise null.

      • getTile

        Tile getTile()
        Gets the tile the game object is currently occupying.
        Returns:
        Tile the tile currently occupied if visible, otherwise null.

      • getHolder

        Farmhand getHolder()
        Gets the current farmhand holding the game object.
        Returns:
        Farmhand the farmhand holding the entity, if any, otherwise null.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Returns:
        true if the entity is visible, otherwise false.
